task.title: How to Paste Copied Text in a Word Document
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to paste copied portions of text, that is, how to reuse clipboard items that you copied or cut throughout the day.

step.cmd: Go to the Home tab and click the arrow on the bottom right of the Clipboard section of the ribbon.
The clipboard history displays in a side pane on the left. From there, you can review the items, select one to reuse it, paste them all, or clear the history.

taskbody.result: You can reuse portions of text without copying or cutting and pasting.
